snippet: Adrian Peterson has always called himself a quick healer. Now he says he's ready to come back from his latest knee surgery even sooner than he originally thought....
lead_paragraph: Adrian Peterson has always called himself a quick healer. Now he says he's ready to come back from his latest knee surgery even sooner than he originally thought.

headline.main: Vikings' Peterson Says He Will Play Sunday Against Colts
headline.print_headline: Vikings' Peterson Says He Will Play Sunday Against Colts
